about_the_game:
KNOCK 'EM OUT!

Lovingly smack your loved ones and stylishly throw them into various things! As Backyard Beans, you meet where it hurts and joyfully brawl through your circle of friends.

COOPERATIVE BRAWLING

True to the motto "together against each other," you meet in the backyards of the Rocket Beans universe and briefly settle in this brawler who is right and why. Talking is silver, silence is gold. Hitting is Epic Legendary Mystic Platinum.














ALL OR NOTHING – NOT SO EASY ACCESS

Backyard Beans is in Early Access and hopefully shows you what the foundation for the game's further development could look like. We have our own wish and feature list, but we are very excited about your support and feedback. Of course, we would be happy about many sold versions – they would allow us to adapt the development time and financial basis more structured and better to everyday realities. We believe in being able to build more backyards with other modes that can offer you and your friends great places to hang out and "brawl" digitally. To do this well, your wishes and suggestions for improvement are very important to us.

INTERESTED IN THE BEAN – A KEV x ROCKET BEANS GAME

Backyard Beans is a long-held wish and still in development. We love games and love that people develop games. This project has come to this Early Access version through Kev without financial investment – he has invested a lot of time, talent, and heart. He has built this game over and over again in between. A long time ago, we had the idea to develop our own "The Beef" game: a cool brawler from the Rocket Beans universe that could ideally convey "the feeling of Beef". Among many other ideas, castles in the air, and attempts, Backyard Beans came out – the first step towards game development with talented devs like Kev.

PRAISE IS LIKE A MEDKIT

This is a heartfelt project. Feel free to leave criticism. Please be mindful of your tone, we would like to continue developing Backyard Beans with as much motivation and support as possible. Thank you!

Lovingly smack your loved ones and stylishly throw them into various things! As Backyard Beans, you meet where it hurts and joyfully brawl through your circle of friends.

Among many other ideas, castles in the air, and attempts, Backyard Beans came out – the first step towards game development with talented devs like Kev.

name: Backyard Beans

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600@ 3.1 GHz or AMD R5 1600X @ 3.5 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1650 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A high-speed internet connection and a good connection between players are required to play online
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8/10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 10400 3.1 GHz or AMD Ryzen 5 2600x 3.1 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A high-speed internet connection and a good connection between players are required to play online

short_description: Lovingly smack your loved ones and stylishly throw them into various things! As Backyard Beans, you meet where it hurts and joyfully brawl through your circle of friends.
